enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: Chair Abdulla drew attention to a document prepared by the Secretariat on options for using web-based approaches to share experiences and exchange information on good practices in policies and measures (FCCC/SBSTA/2004/Inf.10). SAUDI ARABIA said he would provide input during the roundtable discussion scheduled for Tuesday morning, 24 May 2005.
The EU expressed disappointment that more progress was not made at SBSTA-21, and favored a 'prompt start to a smart, low-cost website.
' AOSIS noted that exchanges of ideas will help post-2012 discussions.
Tony Surridge (South Africa) and Normand Tremblay (Canada) will chair a contact group.
